attributes.action: re open the petition against road pricing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition against road pricing should be opened again to allow all the people who are against the scheme to sign.  The reasons being are that there are still a lot of people wanting to voice there opinion against this idea which violates human rights.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on road pricing:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=road+pricing
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
